content: Which British band released the album 'A Night at the Opera' featuring the hit song 'Bohemian Rhapsody'?

That would be Queen, one of the most iconic British rock bands in history. 'A Night at the Opera' was released in 1975 and 'Bohemian Rhapsody' is undoubtedly one of their most famous tracks, known for its unique structure and Freddie Mercury's powerful vocals. The song has become a staple in popular culture and continues to be loved by generations of music fans.
